design_philosophy.visual_style: Modern Travel Magazine meets High-Utility SaaS

usage_rules.headings: Use Fraunces for all H1-H3. Font weight should vary: Light (300) for elegance, Black (900) for impact. Letter spacing: tight.
usage_rules.body: Use Plus Jakarta Sans for all UI text, labels, and paragraphs. Keep line-height loose (1.6) for readability.
usage_rules.uppercase: Use uppercase + wide tracking (0.1em) for overlines and small labels.

rules.gradients: Avoid full-screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients in hero sections only.
rules.contrast: Ensure text contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1. Use Deep Navy for text, never pure black.

spacing.scale: Use 2x standard spacing. If you think p-4 is enough, use p-8.

grids.marketing: Use 'Tetris Grid' for destination showcases (mix of col-span-2, col-span-1, row-span-2).
grids.listings: Use 'Wide Cards' for hotels: Image carousel on left (40%), Details on right (60%). Stack on mobile.
grids.details: Use 'Bento Grid' for amenities and photo galleries.

surfaces.glassmorphism: Use for sticky headers and floating search bars. Class: 'bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-sm'.
surfaces.cards: Flat white background, 1px border (slate-100), soft shadow-sm. On hover: -translate-y-1, shadow-lg, border-blue-200.

buttons.classes: rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-all active:scale-95

inputs.classes: h-12 rounded-xl border-2 border-slate-200 focus:border-primary focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary/10 transition-all

search_bar.style: Floating, pill-shaped or rounded-2xl, glass effect.
search_bar.location: Hero section, centered or overlapping the hero image.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use glassmorphism with backdrop-blur-xl for overlays.
Add micro-interactions to every button and card (hover, active states).
All interactive elements MUST have a data-testid attribute.
Do not use 'Inter' font for headings. Use 'Fraunces'.
Ensure mobile responsiveness is prioritized (stack grids, adjust padding).
